thread.title: Girl Savagely Edits Her Former Friend Out of Picture – See the Hilarious Results
thread.title_full: Girl Savagely Edits Her Former Friend Out of Picture – See the Hilarious Results

author: Lindsay Kimble
title: Girl Savagely Edits Her Former Friend Out of Picture – See the Hilarious Results
text:
We’ve all been there: you’ve parted ways with a friend or a lover, and trashed most of the evidence that the relationship even existed. Well, except for that one photo – the lighting is just right.
So, what to do? One Twitter user had the perfect solution for salvaging a good photo featuring an ex-pal.
The woman, whose name is Serena, put her editing skills to the test, completely eliminating the friend in question from an image of them posing with a car – with a little help from the drawing tool.
She captioned the before and after , “Y’all ever stop [f—— with] someone but like the way YOU looked in the pic… so you gotta…”
Serena Caballero Though the photoshop job wasn’t flawless, Serena’s efforts quickly went viral, garnering nearly 50,000 likes on the social media website.
Other users were quick to share their own attempts – to mixed results.
@CaballeroSerena girl yes or you just gotta.. pic.twitter.com/pk7X15wHvF 
— Y (@Dawn_Dawn14) March 21, 2017 
@CaballeroSerena ohh yass girl I mean even though you still got love for em' sometimes @McConaughey makes it better pic.twitter.com/otx6dRkYV7 
— Alyssa Musselman (@its_mussels) March 21, 2017 

FROM PEOPLE: This Is How Long You’ll Have To Work To Make As Much Money As Rihanna’s Hit ‘Work’ 
@CaballeroSerena pic.twitter.com/FhZOCJdrIP 
— ⚘meme queen⚘ (@alyisapanda) March 26, 2017 

No word yet on how the former friend responded, but we suspect it’s now even more unlikely that these two will mend fences.
